title: This AI tool saves you time by turning your ideas into full-length manuscripts, but you’ll keep the rights
content:
Macworld

Between toggling apps on my MacBook and trying to keep up with Slack, who has time to write a book—let alone read one? That’s why YouBooks AI caught my eye. It’s an AI-powered tool that helps you generate entire non-fiction books with just a few prompts, and right now you can grab a lifetime subscription for just $49 (regularly $540).

Here’s how it works: You give it an idea—anything from productivity hacks to startup strategies—and it calls in a lineup of powerful AI models (think ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and more) to craft a full-length manuscript. We’re talking up to 300,000 words, with real-time web research and even style matching to sound like you.

Each month, you get 150,000 credits (1 credit = 1 word), so you can create multiple books per year, download them in PDF, Word, or EPUB format, and even sell them. You can even keep full commercial rights by having Youbooks generate your next book.

As someone who’s been “working on a book” since 2018, this feels like a shortcut I’m actually okay with. If you’ve got ideas worth publishing—but not the time or patience—this is a no-brainer.

Join me and grab your own Youbooks lifetime subscription for just $49 to start transforming your ideas into a full-length title.
